com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Jack Mueller on 1/28/15. This class encapsulates all the different settings and variations a different game of Dice Wars can have.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Configuration

        public Configuration(java.lang.String[] names,
                     java.lang.String[] statuses,
                     Color[] colors,
                     boolean cT,
                     boolean rR,
                     int size)
        Full constructor for a game Configuration. Forces all of the Configuration properties to be set to their game values. Useful for single player games.
        Parameters:
        names - A list of the players' screen names.
        statuses - A list of the players' statuses defined by Player.STATUS_YOU STATUS variables.
        colors - A list of the players' colors defined by Color.
        cT - Whether this configuration will have colorless territories enabled.
        rR - Whether this configuration will have user defined or random reinforcements.
        size - The size of the board defined by AbstractBoard.BOARD_SIZE_SMALL.

      • Configuration

        public Configuration(Intent intent)
        Defines a Configuration by the extras of the passed intent. Extra keys are defined at PLAYERS_KEY.
        Parameters:
        intent - The intent with extras fully defining this Configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • upload

        public Intent upload(Intent intent)
        Returns the passed intent with the configurations separated into primitive types and matched with string keys that are defined as this class' members.
        Parameters:
        intent - The link to the activity that needs configuration settings
        Returns:
        An intent with extras that fully define a Configuration

      • isColorlessTerritory

        public boolean isColorlessTerritory()
        Returns:
        Whether the board will start with some colorless territories.

      • setColorlessTerritory

        public void setColorlessTerritory(boolean colorlessTerritory)
        Parameters:
        colorlessTerritory - Setting to false will ensure all territories are assigned on game start.

      • isRandomReinforce

        public boolean isRandomReinforce()
        Returns:
        Whether defense phase reinforcements will be randomly allocated

      • setRandomReinforce

        public void setRandomReinforce(boolean randomReinforce)
        Parameters:
        randomReinforce - Setting to true will allow players to choose how to allocate their reinforcements.

      • getMaxPlayers

        public static int getMaxPlayers()
        Returns:
        The maximum number of players one game of DiceWars can handle.

      • getAppMode

        public int getAppMode()
        Returns:
        Returns the app mode that the game is running.

      • setAppMode

        public void setAppMode(int appMode)
        Parameters:
        appMode - sets the app mode for upcoming games.

      • getBoardSize

        public int getBoardSize()
        Returns:
        The board size code
